column5: Doobie, Doobie, Doobie. I can hear the chants all the way from Long Island. The Leaf fans can cry all they want about Brodeur on the bench, but they had their chance on Thursday night to finish off the Islanders. Now maybe all those leaf flags on the cars will be put away for another year.
Leafs got what they deserved..... an early spring tee time.
